data.title: Fall Lineup, What are You Looking Forward To?
data.meta_description:
Even with the bad review it got on some site I read, I'm eager to get Romancing Saga for PS2.  Also, I can't wait for:

Radiata Stories - PS2
Castlevania...
data.text:
Well, so far I have the following pre-ordered and paid for:

Darkwatch (Xbox) (comes out today)

Mortal Kombat Shaolin Monks (Xbox)

Far Cry Instincts (Xbox)

Half-Life 2 (Xbox)

Quake 4 (Xbox 360)

Castlevania: Curse Of Darkness (Xbox)

Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows (Xbox) (Hopefully this will still be a fall release)

I'm interested in the following games as well:

Xbox

Metal Slug 4 & 5

King Kong

I plan on eventually picking all of those up at some point. I'm not overly picky and there look to be a lot of solid titles launching this fall. A lot of these games are going to get smothered and have really quick price drops. I'll be there to pick them up when they do.

My big three for the fall were:

01 - Project Gotham Racing 3

02 - Perfect Dark Zero

03 - The Legend Of Zelda: Twilight Princess

...but now...ehh...I guess I got a big two. I'm not sure yet, but I want to get more details on EA's plans for SSX 4 for the XBox 360. From what I understand, they are bringing it to the system, but not until sometime next year. Depending on how long that wait is, I might make SSX 4 for XBox my last current gen game.

All the games I've listed are what I'm interested in, the titles bolded are the ones I plan on getting on or near release (here's hoping for a good deal on them!)

PS2:

Kingdom Hearts II

MegaMan X Collection (Might get it for GC instead)

Castlevania: Curse of Darkness

[eM] -eNCHANT arM-

Quake 4

The Movies

Advance Wars: Dual Strike

Lunar: Dragon Song

Trance Memory

Lost in Blue

Trauma Center: Under The Knife

Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney

Metroid Prime: Hunters DS

A Boy And His Blob

Mario Kart DS

Metroid Pinball DS

Electroplankton

Sonic Rush

Animal Crossing

GBA:

One Piece

Gunstar Super Heroes

Beyond the 360 launch and like 8 titles I want for it my "must have" list is really small. I'm going to wait for $20 land after Xmas to pick up most of the games people have listed.

The Shadow of Colossus and Okami are the only two games I'd pay more than $20 for for current gen systems this fall. If someone could convince me Rhapsodia was going to have a really small print run I might consider it as well since I have the complete Suikoden collection. Konami and rare don't go hand in hand this generation though. I'm fully expecting the Namco, Midway and Capcom collections to be $20 as well as We Love Katamari so they're no brainers.

I learned in 2003 never to buy holiday titles by the boatload at full price. Even games I thought would do well were $20 at BB within a month of Christmas. Example? I purchased Beyond Good & Evil AND XIII for $40-50. Didn't regret it but damn, I did learn my lesson. They were $15-20 the week after Christmas. I hadn't even played either before that drop but both were fantastic games.

See what the game industry has taught us? I'm so discriminating when buying titles that aren't online now because of 2003.

Battlefield 2 special forces

FEAR

Condemned

Quake 4

Metal Gear Solid 3 to a lesser degree (I want it, but I doubt I would play online all that much)

pretty much those are the titles I plan to get near launch. If Serious Sam 2 is a budget title, I may pick that one up as well after I pick up the first and second encounters

Man, thank god for the DS. I've never been excited about so many games in such a short span of time before...

Trace Memory, Lost in Blue, Under the Knife, Pheonix Wright, Shogun Warrior/Empires, and Mario Kart all look like they're worth a shot.

I certainly hope AoE rules the pc this fall. And I'm praying Blitz: The League doesn't turn out to suck (though I'll definitely wait on it, since I got Madden 2006). We Love Katamari & SSX should be good, too. Bully & The Warriors I'm curious about, but I'm not expecting anything great.

I'll do a rundown of everything I'm looking forward to:

PS2

Dragon Quest VIII

Grandia III (if it makes it this year)

Jak X

Kingdom Hearts 2

Ratchet: Deadlocked

We Love Katamari
